alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 17 at 3:07AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 or more inches possible in the most persistent snow bands. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow from our coastal storm is ending with little or no additional accumulation early this morning. For the lake effect event, the heaviest snow amounts are expected to occur north of Route 28. Snow rates in excess of 1 inch per hour will be possible. This band is expected to drop southward for a time Sunday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
